replies.body:
Could also be that he wasn't trying or warming up. I fought him once right after playing Osu or something and my aim was SOOO bad, but I managed to get a 3-hit combo on him to start, which shouldn't happen, given he's considered a top PvPer. But I've seen him fight even against people I'd get fcked by. 

We all have our casual matches, if he was trying, I wouldn't have got that combo (not to be a fanboy)

replies.body:
Pot- Combo Dombo

Avicus- Glitchy1 or Emmaye

UHC- SamAGaming by a longshot. He should have twice as many subs as xNestorio (https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=1XZ598OND40)

SG- _Phyre ( I dont really know much MCSG players so I just chose him cuz he dope)

Soup- Idk

Overall- DaGoldBrick, pwns in everything

Bow- Im pretty good, but id say xNestorio

Huahwi, Oculism, ItsTene and Stimpy are way too overrated. Huahwi is good, but hes a bow spammer and has close to no skill. I could beat him. Oculism straight lines everything, same for Stimpy, but he strafes a little and abuses his 1 ms. ItsTene hacks probs, but he isnt really good tbh.

Huahwi, Oculism, ItsTene and Stimpy are way too overrated. Huahwi is good, but hes a bow spammer and has close to no skill. I could beat him. Oculism straight lines everything, same for Stimpy, but he strafes a little and abuses his 1 ms. ItsTene hacks probs, but he isnt really good tbh.

replies.body: Its very hard to know who is the definitive "best PVPer" ever, since MC is so vast and there is so many players to play. Not to mention variables such as ping and internet connection, but the best PvPer I ever had the pleasure to "duel" would be Mathemagician1; AKA Regnant ( different server ) and best I have ever seen is DowseyMC, btw... my opinion :P
